channel.title: hakyll-journal on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hakyll-journal on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Hopefully made the repo palatable
item.description: ##13:55 Monday 03 November 2014 JST## I clobbered the git history of my hakyll-journal repo on GitHub so that I could split my personal junk out of the basic journal. Especially after Travis did a lot of nice refactoring, I wanted to include that in a nice version that people could download and use. It’s done now, and I learned about git clone repo.git --single-branch
